name: Unexpected Chess
description:
Unexpected Chess!

Made by team of two guys with no prior experience with c# and unity in just a week for the Unexpected Game Jam.

Every piece has its own morale, which can impact or hamper its attacking and movement abilities! Morale is affected by captures and kill scoring of other pieces within the same team depending on their relationship with eachother.

There are some bugs, and missing features that we couldn't implement before the deadline because of unity collab server issues and file corruption.. but we did our best, promise!

Oh, and, Alt + F4 to quit the game.

P.S. there are many more upcoming features, so stay tuned !
